name: ConvertDset
author: AFNI Developers
description: Converts a surface dataset from one format to another.

inputs.name: Output Type
inputs.description: Type of output datasets

inputs.name: Input Dataset
inputs.description: Input dataset to be converted

inputs.name: Input Type
inputs.description: Type of input datasets

inputs.name: Output Prefix
inputs.description: Output prefix for dataset

inputs.name: Dataset Labels
inputs.description: Label the columns (sub-bricks) of the output dataset

inputs.name: Add Node Index
inputs.description: Add a node index element if one does not exist in the input dataset

inputs.name: Node Index File
inputs.description: File containing node indices

inputs.name: Node Select File
inputs.description: File specifying the nodes to keep in the output

inputs.name: Prepend Node Index
inputs.description: Add a node index column to the data

inputs.name: Pad to Node
inputs.description: Output a full dataset from node 0 to MAX_INDEX

inputs.name: Labelize
inputs.description: Turn the dataset into a labeled set per the colormap in CMAP

inputs.name: Graphize
inputs.description: Turn the dataset into a SUMA graph dataset

inputs.name: Graph Node List
inputs.description: Two files specifying the indices and the coordinates of the graph's nodes

inputs.name: Graph Full Node List
inputs.description: Similar to -graph_nodelist_1D but without need for NODEINDLIST.1D

inputs.name: Graph Named Node List
inputs.description: Two files specifying graph node indices, string labels, and their coordinates

inputs.name: Graph XYZ LPI
inputs.description: Coordinates in NodeList.1D are in LPI instead of RAI

inputs.name: Graph Edge List
inputs.description: Indices of graph nodes defining edge

inputs.name: Onegraph
inputs.description: Expect input dataset to be one square matrix defining the graph (default)

inputs.name: Multigraph
inputs.description: Expect each column in input dataset to define an entire graph

inputs.name: Split
inputs.description: Split a multi-column dataset into about N output datasets

inputs.name: No History
inputs.description: Do not include a history element in the output
